    \let\PYG@ul=\relax \let\PYG@tc=\relax%
    \let\PYG@bc=\relax \let\PYG@ff=\relax}
\def\PYG@tok#1{\csname PYG@tok@#1\endcsname}
\def\PYG@toks#1+{\ifx\relax#1\empty\else%
    \PYG@tok{#1}\expandafter\PYG@toks\fi}
\def\PYG@do#1{\PYG@bc{\PYG@tc{\PYG@ul{%
    \PYG@it{\PYG@bf{\PYG@ff{#1}}}}}}}
\def\PYG#1#2{\PYG@reset\PYG@toks#1+\relax+\PYG@do{#2}}

\PYG{n}{foo} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Including Unicode characters: üöä}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}

    \PYG{k}{pass}

    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{baz}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\},numbers=left,firstnumber=9,stepnumber=1]

    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{baz}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{k}{pass}
\end{Verbatim}

    \PYG{k}{pass}

\PYG{k}{class} \PYG{n+nc}{Bar}\PYG{p}{:}
\end{Verbatim}

\section{Named Literal Include}
\label{namedblocks:named-literal-include}
\def\SphinxLiteralBlockLabel{\label{namedblocks:some-python-code}}
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Literally included file using Python highlighting}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} \PYGZhy{}*\PYGZhy{} coding: utf\PYGZhy{}8 \PYGZhy{}*\PYGZhy{}}

\PYG{n}{foo} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Including Unicode characters: üöä}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}

\PYG{k}{class} \PYG{n+nc}{Foo}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{k}{pass}

\PYG{k}{class} \PYG{n+nc}{Bar}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{baz}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{k}{pass}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} comment after Bar class definition}
\PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{bar}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{k}{pass}
\end{Verbatim}
\let\SphinxLiteralBlockLabel\empty


\chapter{Literal Includes for python}
\label{python::doc}\label{python:literal-includes-for-python}

\section{block start with blank or comment}
\label{python:block-start-with-blank-or-comment}
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{block\PYGZus{}start\PYGZus{}with\PYGZus{}comment}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Comment}
    \PYG{k}{return} \PYG{l+m+mi}{1}
\end{Verbatim}

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{block\PYGZus{}start\PYGZus{}with\PYGZus{}blank}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}

    \PYG{k}{return} \PYG{l+m+mi}{1}
\end{Verbatim}


\chapter{Code blocks}
\label{index:code-blocks}
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\},numbers=left,firstnumber=1,stepnumber=1]
    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{ruby?}
        \PYG{k+kp}{false}
    \PYG{k}{end}
\end{Verbatim}


\chapter{Literal Includes}
\label{index:literal-includes}
\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Literally included file using Python highlighting}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} \PYGZhy{}*\PYGZhy{} coding: utf\PYGZhy{}8 \PYGZhy{}*\PYGZhy{}}

\PYG{n}{foo} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Including Unicode characters: üöä}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}

\PYG{k}{class} \PYG{n+nc}{Foo}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{k}{pass}

\PYG{k}{class} \PYG{n+nc}{Bar}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{baz}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{k}{pass}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} comment after Bar class definition}
\PYG{k}{def} \PYG{n+nf}{bar}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{k}{pass}
\end{Verbatim}
